channel.title: Changed target and royal blood king heck
channel.description:
#### What happened? I've been checking player number 11, and recieved a message that my target were changed. The message after that said that player number 11 got royal blood.
he turned out to be observer, so i think i got another player info #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I supposed to get info about the changed target player, But it wrote me that the changed target was the original target, So I think i just got the number wrong #### Steps to reproduce: The second message should show what is the right number of the player you got redirected to and not the number of the original check.

item.title: Changed target and royal blood king heck
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Tornado should help bd and not giving bd wrong information.

Also, with other classes it gave me the right number

Read full topic
item.source: Changed target and royal blood king heck

item.title: Changed target and royal blood king heck
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
If number are changed, then the tornado would be pointless.

Read full topic

item.title: Changed target and royal blood king heck

item.description:
What happened?

Iâ€™ve been checking player number 11, and recieved a message that my target were changed.
The message after that said that player number 11 got royal blood.

he turned out to be observer, so i think i got another player info

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I supposed to get info about the changed target player,
But it wrote me that the changed target was the original target,
So I think i just got the number wrong

Steps to reproduce:

The second message should show what is the right number of the player you got redirected to and not the number of the original check.
